description.p: Atomic Rollback Tool is a specialized utility for managing ostree-based system deployments. It provides an easy-to-use interface for rolling back to previous deployments, pinning deployments to prevent cleanup, and restoring historical deployments from container registries.

ul.li: View all system deployments with clear status indicators
Rollback to previous deployments with one click
Pin deployments to protect them from automatic cleanup
Search and restore deployments from the last 90 days
Support for Universal Blue and Fedora atomic systems

description.p: Major release - Complete rewrite as specialized tool

ul.li: Dedicated rollback tool with enhanced functionality
Pin/unpin deployment support with proper error handling
Improved thread safety for UI updates

description.p: Initial release of standalone Atomic Rollback Tool
